result.purpose: This folder contains GitHub Actions workflows for automating various tasks such as code analysis, testing, and release processes.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, where each YAML file defines a specific workflow for different tasks, promoting separation of concerns and reusability.

.github/workflows/codeql.yml.purpose: Defines a GitHub Actions workflow for CodeQL analysis on a repository.
side_effects: Triggers analysis on code changes and pull requests
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive data in repository during analysis

.github/workflows/gin.yml.purpose: Defines a GitHub Actions workflow for running tests and performing vulnerability scanning on a Go project.
side_effects: Checks out code from the repository
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive data in logs
Dependency on external actions which may have vulnerabilities

.github/workflows/goreleaser.yml.purpose: Defines a GitHub Actions workflow for automating the release process using GoReleaser.
side_effects: Triggers a Go module reindex at proxy.golang.org
